content: tiny mushroom pattern photo by lucymakescrafts designs this is a simple easy to make pattern some skills are required like fastening off changing colors of yarn and simple embroidery abbreviations single_crochet=single_crochet increase= increase stitch decrease= invisible decrease stitch sts=stitches blo=back loop only of stitch or the loop furthest away from you round=round ml=magic loop anything in parenthesis means how many stitches are in that round materials scissors fiberfill stuffing red yarn white yarn tapestry needle size 4mm crochet hook stitch marker-optional pattern start in red round 1 6 single_crochet in ml 6 round 2 6 single_crochet all around 6 round 3 6 increase all around 12 round 4 1 single_crochet increase all around 18 round 5 2 single_crochet increase all around 24 color change to white this makes the stem of the mushroom round 6 in blo decrease all around 12 round 7 i both loops single_crochet decrease all around 8 stuff the piece round 8 decrease all around 4 this part does get pretty tight to work with so you can switch to a smaller sized crochet hook if you like rnds 9-12 single_crochet all around 4 sts for each round if you want your mushroom stem to be bent a certain way you can put a piece of pipe cleaner in the end before you fasten_off fasten_off with a tapestry needle or sew the end closed cut about an arms length of white yarn and embroider some spots onto the red part of your mushroom thank you for making this pattern i hope you enjoyed it photo and pattern by lucymakescrafts designs
